attributes.action: Get the UK government to accept more refugees coming into EU to escape war zones
attributes.background: This summer has seen unprecedented numbers of refugees entering the EU to escape war in Syria, Afghanistan, and other regions of conflict.  Amidst this global crisis, the Government's refusal to accept a fairer share of those entering the EU to flee terror is aborrhent, and should be changed .

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105991

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
